entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
